description:
Pull up your hood and get shredding. The built-in gaiter allows you to protect your face without needing the hood up. Great for those who want a balaclava without the restriction of something snug against your head.

  • Recycled polyester with WindWall™ windproof overlaly
  • Fabric has a DWR finish to shed snow
  • Helmet compatible hood has a shockcord tightening system
name: The North Face Whimzy Powder Hood - Unisex
